definition: visceral arch (gill-bearing arch or its vestigial crease on sides of neck of vertebrates)

sentences.english: Both fish and tadpoles have gills.
The fine structure of the gill in Pangasius sutchi has been investigated using transmission and scanning electron microscopy.
sentences.chinese: 对苏氏鲶鳃结构进行扫描和透射电镜观察。

sentences.english: They feed at or close to the surface with their mouths wide open and gill rakers erect.
sentences.chinese: 姥鲨会在或近水面张开口及竖起鳃耙来摄食。

sentences.english: Elasmobranch study is weak comparatively in China.
sentences.chinese: 我国对板鳃鱼类的研究比较薄弱。

sentences.english: It has a very unique snake skin pattern on the gill plate.
sentences.chinese: 它有一个非常独特的蛇皮花纹鳃板。

sentences.english: European cave-dwelling aquatic salamander with permanent external gills.
sentences.chinese: 长有永久性外部鳃的欧洲穴居水栖蝾螈。

sentences.english: It flowed over Shemsen's gills , seducing his senses.
sentences.chinese: 它流进舍姆森的鳃里，诱惑着他的知觉。

sentences.english: The flat cells in the ordinary gill filaments are respiratory epithelia.
sentences.chinese: 普通鳃丝的扁平细胞为呼吸上皮。

sentences.english: Many secondary gill lamellae arranged on two sides of each filament, and inlaid each other.
sentences.chinese: 鳃小片呈褶皱状，镶嵌排列在鳃丝两侧。

sentences.english: Many secondary gill lamellae arranged on two sides of each filament, and inlaid each other.
sentences.chinese: 鳃小片呈褶皱状，镶嵌排列在鳃丝两侧。

sentences.english: Provincial police said yesterday that Gill killed himself after being hit by police bullets.
sentences.chinese: 省的警察昨天说鳃在被警察子弹打之后杀了他自己。

sentences.english: The liver is the detoxification organs are the respiratory gills.
sentences.chinese: 肝脏是解毒器官，鳃是呼吸器官。

sentences.english: All gill filaments have the same structure.
sentences.chinese: 所有鳃丝的组织结构均相同。

sentences.english: These are pale discolor areas on the gills that is not normal, she says.
sentences.chinese: 这些都在鳃是不正常的苍白褪色的地区，她说。

sentences.english: The histological and surface structures of the gill in Sinonvaculina constricta were observed with light and scanning electron microscope.
sentences.chinese: 用光镜和扫描电镜观察了缢蛏鳃的组织学和表面结构。

definition: fish head/fig. upright and unwilling to compromise
sheatfish (Parasilurus asotus)/oriental catfish/see also 鮎|鲇[nian2]
